item.title: Quantum Machine Learning
item.description:
âš›ï¸ Quantum Machine Learning (QML) is where the surreal beauty of quantum physics meets the power of artificial intelligence.

What is Quantum Machine Learning?

Quantum Machine Learning (QML) is an emerging interdisciplinary field that combines quantum computing with machine learning techniques. It aims to explore:

â€œCan quantum computers accelerate or enhance the capabilities of traditional machine learning models?â€

Key ideas behind QML include:

  • Encoding classical data into quantum states
  • Designing trainable quantum circuits
  • Using hybrid quantum-classical training loops

Why Does QML Matter?

Quantum computers offer exponential parallelism in certain scenarios. Potential benefits of QML include:

A quantum string yet uncollapsed,
Half a page of superposition too tangled to write.
The heart unmeasuredâ€”how many times must entanglement sigh?
Love and fucking Love
